src:
Os relatores do pacote de medidas pós-Previdência

06 Nov 2019, 17:48

Acabam de ser definidos no Senado os relatores de duas das PECs apresentadas nesta semana pelo governo:
— a PEC do pacto federativo será relatada por Márcio Bittar, do MDB;
— a PEC dos fundos públicos será relatada por Otto Alencar, do PSD.
A relatoria da PEC emergencial ficará com o Podemos, que ainda não escolheu um senador.
text:
The rapporteurs of the post-welfare package

Nov 06 2019, 17:48

In the Senate, the rapporteurs for two of the PECs presented this week by the government have just been defined:
- the PEC of the federative pact will be reported by Márcio Bittar of the MDB;
- PEC from public funds will be reported by Otto Alencar of the PSD.
The emergency PEC rapporteur will stay with Somos, which has not yet chosen a senator.
